PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: MARINA, daughter to Pericles and Thaisa.
Lords, Knights, Gentlemen, Sailors, Pirates, Fishermen, and Messengers.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Antioch. A room in the palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ANTIOCHUS, Prince PERICLES, and followers
Music. Enter the Daughter of ANTIOCHUS

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PERICLES
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Takes hold of the hand of the Daughter of ANTIOCHUS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Tyre. A room in the palace.
SCENE III. Tyre. An ante-chamber in the palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HELICANUS and ESCANES, with other Lords of Tyre

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Tarsus. A room in the Governor's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter CLEON, the governor of Tarsus, with DIONYZA,
and others

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GOWER
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter at one door PERICLES talking with CLEON; all
the train with them. Enter at another door a
Gentleman, with a letter to PERICLES; PERICLES
shows the letter to CLEON; gives the Messenger a
reward, and knights him. Exit PERICLES at one
door, and CLEON at another

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Pentapolis. An open place by the sea-side.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Re-enter Second and Third Fishermen, drawing up a net
Enter SIMONIDES, THAISA, Lords, and Attendants

Enter a Knight; he passes over, and his Squire
presents his shield to the Princess
The Sixth Knight, PERICLES, passes over
Great shouts within and all cry 'The mean knight!'

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The same. A hall of state: a banquet prepared.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter SIMONIDES, THAISA, Lords, Attendants, and
Knights, from tilting

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Tyre. A room in the Governor's house.
SCENE V. Pentapolis. A room in the palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter SIMONIDES, reading a letter, at one door:
the Knights meet him

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GOWER
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter, PERICLES and SIMONIDES at one door, with
Attendants; a Messenger meets them, kneels, and
gives PERICLES a letter: PERICLES shows it
SIMONIDES; the Lords kneel to him. Then enter
THAISA with child, with LYCHORIDA a nurse. The
KING shows her the letter; she rejoices: she and
PERICLES takes leave of her father, and depart with
LYCHORIDA and their Attendants. Then exeunt
SIMONIDES and the rest

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I
SCENE II. Ephesus. A room in CERIMON's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter CERIMON, with a Servant, and some Persons who
have been shipwrecked
Enter two or three Servants with a chest

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CERIMON
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Re-enter a Servant, with boxes, napkins, and fire

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Tarsus. A room in CLEON's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter PERICLES, CLEON, DIONYZA, and LYCHORIDA with
MARINA in her arms

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Ephesus. A room in CERIMON's house.
SCENE I. Tarsus. An open place near the sea-shore.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MARINA, with a basket of flowers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Mytilene. A room in a brothel.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Re-enter BOULT, with the Pirates and MARINA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Tarsus. A room in CLEON's house.
SCENE IV
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GOWER, before the monument of MARINA at Tarsus

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GOWER
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter PERICLES, at one door, with all his train;
CLEON and DIONYZA, at the other. CLEON shows
PERICLES the tomb; whereat PERICLES makes
lamentation, puts on sackcloth, and in a mighty
passion departs. Then exeunt CLEON and DIONYZA
Reads the inscription on MARINA's monument

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Mytilene. A street before the brothel.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter, from the brothel, two Gentlemen

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. The same. A room in the brothel.
SCENE I. On board PERICLES' ship, off Mytilene. A close pavilion on deck, with a curtain before it; PERICLES within it, reclined on a couch. A barge lying beside the Tyrian vessel.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter two Sailors, one belonging to the Tyrian
vessel, the other to the barge; to them HELICANUS

The Gentlemen and the two Sailors descend, and go
on board the barge

Enter, from thence, LYSIMACHUS and Lords; with the
Gentlemen and the two Sailors

Whispers a Lord, who goes off in the barge of
LYSIMACHUS

Re-enter, from the barge, Lord, with MARINA, and a
young Lady
DIANA appears to PERICLES as in a vision

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GOWER, before the temple of DIANA at Ephesus

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The temple of Diana at Ephesus; THAISA standing near the altar, as high priestess; a number of Virgins on each side; CERIMON and other Inhabitants of Ephesus attending.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter PERICLES, with his train; LYSIMACHUS,
HELICANUS, MARINA, and a Lady
